title: Bronze II adc main, looking to join a team
body:
Hi,
Im an ADC main looking to join a ranked team in hopes of improving my game play and climbing higher.
My best ADC's at the moment are {{champion:18}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:22}} 
But I am improving my skills with others.
Add me on league.
IGN: Sitruc

replies.body: I'm a support main and if you want to duo at least I'd be down. We can start putting together a team from there if you'd like :)
